verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> He Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jericho. <S%G2410><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Zacchaeus, <S%G2195><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> A Chief Tax Gatherer, <S%G754><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Rich. <S%G4145><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Seeking <S%G2212><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> He Is : <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Was Not Able <S%G1410><s%> For <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Stature <S%G2244><s%> Small <S%G3398><s%> He Was. <S%G2258><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Run Forward <S%G4390><s%> Before, <S%G1715><s%> He Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1909><s%>, A Sycomore, <S%G4809><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might See <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> That Way <S%G1565><s%> He Was About <S%G3195><s%> To Pass. <S%G1330><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%> Looking Up <S%G308><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> Zacchaeus, <S%G2195><s%> Making Haste <S%G4692><s%> Come Down, <S%G2597><s%> <S%G4594><s%> For Today <S%G1063><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Thy House <S%G4675><s%> It Behooveth <S%G1163><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Remain. <S%G3306><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Making Haste <S%G4692><s%> He Came Down <S%G2597><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Received <S%G5264><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen It <S%G1492><s%> All <S%G537><s%> Murmured, <S%G1234><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> A Sinful <S%G268><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> He Has Entered <S%G1525><s%> To Lodge. <S%G2647><s%>

<S%G2476><s%> But Standing <S%G1161><s%> Zacchaeus <S%G2195><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Half <S%G2255><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> Of My Possessions, <S%G3450><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I Give <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Poor, <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Of Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> I Took By False Accusation, <S%G4811><s%> I Return <S%G591><s%> Fourfold. <S%G5073><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3754><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> To This House <S%G5129><s%> Is Come, <S%G1096><s%> Inasmuch As <S%G2530><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> A Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> Is : <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> For Came <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> To Seek <S%G2212><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Lost. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G191><s%> But As Were Hearing <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> These Things, <S%G5023><s%> Adding <S%G4369><s%> He Spoke <S%G2036><s%> A Parable, <S%G3850><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G1511><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thought <S%G1380><s%> They <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> Was About <S%G3195><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> To Be Manifested. <S%G398><s%>

He Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> High Born <S%G2104><s%> Proceeded <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Country <S%G5561><s%> Distant, <S%G3117><s%> To Receive <S%G2983><s%> For Himself <S%G1438><s%> A Kingdom <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Return. <S%G5290><s%>

<S%G2564><s%> And Having Called <S%G1161><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> <S%G1401><s%> Of His Bondmen <S%G1438><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Minas, <S%G3414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Trade <S%G4231><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> I Come. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4177><s%> But His Citizens <S%G846><s%> Hated <S%G3404><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> An Embassy <S%G4242><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Are Unwilling For <S%G2309><s%> This Man <S%G5126><s%> To Reign <S%G936><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Coming Back Again <S%G1880><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom, <S%G932><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He Directed <S%G2036><s%> To Be Called <S%G5455><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> These Bondmen <S%G5128><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Money, <S%G694><s%> In Order That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What Each <S%G5101><s%> Had Gained By Trading. <S%G1281><s%>

<S%G3854><s%> And Came Up <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First, <S%G4413><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3414><s%> Thy Mina <S%G4675><s%> Has Produced <S%G4333><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Minas. <S%G3414><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>, Well! <S%G2095><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Bondman; <S%G1401><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Very Little <S%G1646><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Thou Wast, <S%G1096><s%> Be Thou <S%G2468><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Over <S%G1883><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second, <S%G1208><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3414><s%> Thy Mina <S%G4675><s%> Has Made <S%G4160><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Minas. <S%G3414><s%>
<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To This One, <S%G5129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Be <S%G1096><s%> Over <S%G1883><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Came, <S%G2064><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3414><s%> Thy Mina, <S%G4675><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Kept <S%G2192><s%> Laid Up <S%G606><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Handkerchief. <S%G4676><s%>

I Feared <S%G5399><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Harsh <S%G840><s%> Thou Art; <S%G1488><s%> Thou Takest Up <S%G142><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Didst Not Lay Down <S%G5087><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Reapest <S%G2325><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Didst Not Sow. <S%G4687><s%>

He Says <S%G3004><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Thy Mouth <S%G4675><s%> I Will Judge <S%G2919><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Bondman : <S%G1401><s%> Thou Knewest <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS A Man 444 N-NSM Harsh 840 A-NSM Am, 1510 V-PXI-1S Taking Up 142 V-PAP-NSM What 3739 R-ASN 3756 PRT-N I Did Not Lay Down 5087 V-AAI-1S And 2532 CONJ Reaping 2325 V-PAP-NSM What 3739 R-ASN 3756 PRT-N I Did Not Sow! 4687 V-AAI-1S

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Didst Thou Not Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G694><s%> My Money <S%G3450><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bank, <S%G5132><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Coming 2064 V-2AAP-NSM With 4862 PREP 5110 N-DSM Interest 302 PRT Might Have Required 4238 V-AAI-1S It? 846 P-ASN

And <S%G2532><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> Standing By <S%G3936><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Take <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mina, <S%G3414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give It <S%G1325><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Minas <S%G3414><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> They Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Minas. <S%G3414><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Given; <S%G1325><s%> <S%G575><s%> But From <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Him Who <S%G3361><s%> Has Not, <S%G2192><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Taken <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Moreover <S%G4133><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2190><s%> Mine Enemies <S%G3450><s%>, Those <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Who <S%G3361><s%> Were Unwilling For <S%G2309><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Reign <S%G936><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Bring <S%G71><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Slay Them <S%G2695><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Me. <S%G3450><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> He Went On <S%G4198><s%> Before, <S%G1715><s%> Going Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He Drew Near <S%G1448><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Bethphage, <S%G967><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%>, Of His Disciples, <S%G846><s%>

Saying, <S%G2036><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Opposite You <S%G2713><s%> Village, <S%G2968><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Entering <S%G1531><s%> Ye Will Find <S%G2147><s%> A Colt <S%G4454><s%> Tied, <S%G1210><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Ever Yet <S%G4455><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> Sat : <S%G2523><s%> Having Loosed <S%G3089><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Bring It. <S%G71><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Ask, <S%G2065><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Do Ye Loose It? <S%G3089><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Shall Ye Say <S%G2046><s%>, To Him, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%>
<S%G565><s%> And Having Departed <S%G1161><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Sent <S%G649><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Had Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3089><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And On Their Loosing <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Colt <S%G4454><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Masters <S%G2962><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Loose Ye <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Colt? <S%G4454><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Led <S%G71><s%> It <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Cast <S%G1977><s%> Their <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Garments <S%G2440><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Colt, <S%G4454><s%> They Put On It <S%G1913><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
<S%G4198><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And As He Went <S%G846><s%> They Were Strewing <S%G5291><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Their Garments <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way. <S%G3598><s%>

<S%G1448><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And As He Drew Near <S%G846><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Descent <S%G2600><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Olives <S%G1636><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> All <S%G537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Rejoicing, <S%G5463><s%> To Praise <S%G134><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Had Seen The <S%G1492><s%> Works Of Power, <S%G1411><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> King <S%G935><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Highest. <S%G5310><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Rebuke <S%G2008><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Thy Disciples. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> These <S%G3778><s%>, Should Be Silent <S%G4623><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stones <S%G3037><s%> Will Cry Out. <S%G2896><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He Drew Near, <S%G1448><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> He Wept <S%G2799><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%>, It, <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Hadst Known, <S%G1097><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Thou, <S%G4771><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Even At Least <S%G1065><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> This, <S%G3778><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Thy : <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> They Are Hid <S%G2928><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Thine Eyes; <S%G4675><s%>
